title: Gear Change Rod Setting

body.body: The gear change rod setting dimension is the same for a standard gear change rod and for Triumph Shift Assist (TSA).
If the gear change linkage needs to be removed, ensure the setting dimension and alignment are as described below when refitting.
Make sure the split line on the gear pedal crank lines up to the alignment mark on the gear change shaft
Ensure the distance between the flats of the ball joints is 210.2 mm as shown below.
The length of exposed thread at each end of the gear change rod should be equal.
Tighten the gear change rod lock nuts to
Ensure the gear change mechanism is free to operate, without any excessive play.
